name: MTA Province
description:
MTA Province is a free global multiplayer add-on being developed for the GTA San Andreas game by the JST Project (JS Team).
The project is a unique combination of a public transport simulator and a role-playing game where you can spend time with friends and get to know each other.

There are three cities in the Province (Mirny, Privolzhsk, Nevsky), as well as rural areas (villages). The cities are fictional, but there are many references to real-life objects from different cities of Russia, such as Voronezh, Samara, St. Petersburg, Moscow, Kazan, Tula, Cheboksary, Tolyatti, Volchansk and others.

The basis of the project is public transport: buses, trolleybuses, metro, railway transport, which you can try both as a passenger and as a driver, having got a job.
As for passenger transport, you can choose from a huge fleet of vehicles, from a penny to a powerful sports car, which you can try out after getting your license.
